metadata.title: SDUI Pattern for Mobile Apps
metadata.summary: Discover how the Server-Driven UI pattern empowers mobile teams to update interfaces instantly without app store deployments. Learn why companies like Spotify, Meta, and Amazon use SDUI for dynamic user experiences and large-scale A/B testing.
metadata.author: Louis Place
